SUMMARY
Science is full of once-brilliant ideas that now seem absurd. They weren’t crazy when proposed—they were the best explanations available. Each was eventually replaced by a theory that explained more phenomena with fewer assumptions. Looking b
title: History's Most Famous Theories...That were Dead WRONG!
